QuestData.Title: Parts-is-Parts
QuestData.Description: I've always wanted to try making an abomination. It looks simple enough, but you know how it is when you learn things from a book. There's no substitute for doing!$B$BFirst, I'm going to need parts. Lots of parts. And you're going to get them for me.$B$BNo need to be picky: human, orc... it doesn't matter. Parts is parts.$B$BJust be sure the corpses you harvest come from the Battlescar, so I know they're fresh.$B$B<Calder presses a rusted, gore-covered bonesaw into your hands and smiles disarmingly.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Calder's Bonesaw on corpses within the Battlescar and collect 15 Severed Extremities.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you get my parts? Let me see them!
QuestData.RewardText: <Calder peers into the sack of extremities and licks his lips with a dry, black tongue.>$B$BOh my. This is exciting.$B$B Aren't you excited, $n?
